text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whew～ you were close. 
That stone was almost ours, Taiki!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
But I'm glad you are safe.… I'm sorry, I keep panicking, 
and if it weren't for Ms. Tannhauser……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
―Pwaah! 
What!? I-I'm drifting away!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Umm, uhhh…… uuuuuee!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The river there's flowing something like such, so… hup!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I was the only one who knew what would happen.…… 
and I didn't explain it well enough and…… I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
N-nah, nah. I caused it in the first place! And this is 
only our first time. With today's experience I'm sure 
we'll be fines tomorrow! Hm!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… Back there, I…… 
Why didn't I firmly stop her……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: H-hey……!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(We should think about our plan a little more before 
walking an unstable stone path…… But Rob did 
mention we only have a few minutes.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Taiki — of all — will be fine, right? She wont run 
out of time and fall into the river or something……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Maybe she wouldn't have if I had held her back)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(…… It's the same as always. Every time I want to speak up, 
I stop myself, and just let Taiki lead me along—)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Maybe… it's about the Summer Walk!? Uoh, I want to go! I want to go with you～～!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey! Can we join you in this treasure hunt?! I'm sure more people makes it more exciting!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (And I thought I could pull her along for once…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(On the contrary, I put Taiki in danger 
because I couldn't speak up……!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (……… Just what am I doing?)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Uuu… where did my mask gooo…! 
How could it just disappear while it was drying～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… El?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Aa!? Wua, waa……!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(She ran off… 
… Rare to see her face though. Did she lose her mask?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… Hang on? 
That thing stuck there……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Power! Speed! Bird of mystery and fear! 
El Condor Pasa appears! Thanks so much for 
finding my maaaask!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So your whole mood changes when you put it on…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
El is one with the mask! You could even say I am not 
compleeete without it! …Anyway, please promise me one thing!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Can… can you keep it a secret! 
How weak I am without my mask…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
… Are you? 
… I think you've always been strong.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿Que?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
You can't create out of nothing. Those who are truly 
weak can not change just by putting on a mask.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
………… 
…… Is something bothering you, Dober?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: N-Not really……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Lies! You look down! What's wrong? 
…… You can't be the only one to keep hiding thiings!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I-It's not that big a deal. I just sort of lost confidence. 
… Or maybe I was expecting too much from myself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just dove in head-first, started overthinking things, 
and in the end I couldn't do anything— 
Aah, god, just forget about it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: … You couldn't do anything? You…?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Don't you remeeember when we first met at the campsite?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… Hey uhh anyway, you know… 
… If you don't mind, we…… umm—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You deliberately changed the subject to help me ooouut! 
You're always like this, thinking things through and 
facing them seriously!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
El knows. That you can count on someone 
who thinks things through a lot!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I… that's not……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: "I know you're a little reserved, but you pick things up well. You might not know, but we can always count on you!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… Ah.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If you say El really is strong already, then 
the mask must bring out my full power!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And the same can be said for you! 
Dober sparkles as much as this starry skyyy!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So… here's a present for you! 
A magical mask that only we can see!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Put on the mask and your sparkles will be shining bright! 
Transform into the cool, dependable Señorita Dober!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: El guarantees it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
……… I see. 
Yeah, thanks. I'll try my best.
